Executive Board.description: The core leadership and functional teams driving the chapter's mission and activities.

Leadership.name: Chong Kok Yang
Leadership.bio: A final year student passionate about process design and leading the chapter to provide value to all members.

Business & Industry Relations.name: Bob Williams
Business & Industry Relations.bio: Focuses on connecting students with industry professionals and organizing plant tours and networking events.

Business & Industry Relations.name: Charlie Brown
Business & Industry Relations.bio: Manages the chapter's finances and secures sponsorships to fund our events and projects.

Events Team.name: Diana Miller
Events Team.bio: Handles all chapter communications, manages social media, and ensures our community stays engaged.

Events Team.name: Kevin Durant
Events Team.bio: Assists the Events Director in planning and executing workshops, seminars, and social gatherings.

Publications & Outreach.name: Emily Johnson
Publications & Outreach.bio: Oversees the chapter's publications, including newsletters and promotional materials.

Publications & Outreach.name: Michael Smith
Publications & Outreach.bio: Responsible for outreach initiatives to engage with the wider community and promote AIChE activities.

Web Development & Design.name: Sarah Connor
Web Development & Design.bio: Maintains the chapter's website and ensures it is up-to-date with the latest information.

Web Development & Design.name: John Doe
Web Development & Design.bio: Responsible for the visual design of our materials and ensuring a consistent brand image.

Membership & Engagement.name: Alice Johnson
Membership & Engagement.bio: Focuses on member recruitment, retention, and engagement activities to build a strong community.

Membership & Engagement.name: Bob Smith
Membership & Engagement.bio: Organizes events and activities to foster a sense of belonging among members.

Alumni Relations.name: Charlie Brown
Alumni Relations.bio: Maintains relationships with alumni and organizes events to keep them connected with the chapter.

Academic & Workshops.name: David Lee
Academic & Workshops.bio: Organizes academic workshops and seminars to enhance the learning experience of members.

Academic & Workshops.name: Eva Green
Academic & Workshops.bio: Assists in planning and executing workshops that provide practical skills and knowledge.

Course Representatives.description: Serving as the bridge between the student body and the AIChE student chapter.

members.name: Eileen Paw Zhang Hui
members.bio: Representing the interests and concerns of students from the Chemical and Biomolecular Engineering programme.

members.name: Jason Liau Yi Jun
members.bio: Serving as the bridge between the Bioengineering student body and the AIChE student chapter.

Student Advisors.description: Providing mentorship and guidance to undergraduate members based on academic and industry experience.

members.name: Alex Chen
members.bio: A graduate student providing mentorship and guidance to undergraduate members based on academic and industry experience.

members.name: Samantha Lee
members.bio: A final-year student helping junior members navigate their curriculum and prepare for their final year projects.
